There's a FAQ entry for:
"How can I delete everything beneath a particular directory, preserving the
directory itself?"

But I found myself trying to do something close but not exactly
the same and only found an answer on a ant-user ML post:
"Delete a directory only if empty"

Maybe it can have its own FAQ entry...

I've cooked a patch for that, copying what was said in the other similar entry...
